data.author: Audrey Hepburn
data.quote: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says, I'm possible.

data.author: Brian Tracy
data.quote: By doing what you would do if you were exactly the person you'd like to be, you'll ultimately become that person.

data.author: Uncle Iroh
data.quote: Sometimes, life is like this dark tunnel. You can't always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you keep moving, you will come to a better place.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: Welcome the present moment as if you had invited it. It is all we ever have so we might as well work with it rather than struggle against it. We might as well make it our friend and teacher rather than our enemy.

data.author: Elon Musk
data.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

data.author: Robert Downey Jr.
data.quote: The lesson is that you can still make mistakes and be forgiven.

data.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour
data.quote: One of the hardest decisions you'll ever make in life is choosing whether to walk away or try harder.

data.author: Ronald Reagan
data.quote: A people free to choose will always choose peace.

data.author: Benjamin Jowett
data.quote: Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them howel

data.author: William P. Young
data.quote: I really do believe that od is love, one of deep affection and grace and forviveness and inspiration

data.author: William Blake
data.quote: The man who never in his mind and thoughts travel'd to heaven is no artist

data.author: Napoleon Bonaparte
data.quote: In politics stupidity is not a handicap

data.author: Aldo Leopold
data.quote: Conservation is a state of hrmony between men and land

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.quote: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe

data.author: Jessamyn West
data.quote: The past is really almost as much a work of the imagination as the future

data.author: William Ellery Channing
data.quote: Faith is love taking the form of aspiration

data.author: Bill Watterson
data.quote: If people sat outside the looked at the stars each night, I'll bet they'd live a lot differently

data.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
data.quote: Every creator painfully experiences the chasm between his inner vision and its ultimate expression

data.author: William Lyon Phelps
data.quote: If I didn't start painting, I would have raised chickens

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower
